item.title: 5 must-visit destinations in Patagonia for modern explorers
item.description:
5 must-visit destinations in Patagonia for modern explorers

Patagonia's 400,000 square miles are home to some of the most beautiful and diverse landscapes on the planet. It's an ideal destination for adventure seekers and one of our top destinations for travel in 2016. This expansive area of land, spread across southern Chile and Argentina, is too much to take in all at once.

item.title: How A Man's Fitbit Got Him The Medical Care He Needed
item.description:
How A Man's Fitbit Got Him The Medical Care He Needed

On Jan. 5, a man checked into a hospital's emergency room in Camden, New Jersey. Because his heart was beating irregularly, doctors suspected he had atrial fibrillation, the most common type of arrhythmia, which can increase the risk of stroke. But to decide how to treat him, they needed to know exactly how long his heart had been acting up.

item.title: Ossic headphones create 3D audio unique to you
item.description:
Ossic headphones create 3D audio unique to you

When you're wandering around in Jurassic Park and you hear a T-Rex roar, you run in the other direction. It's just good sense. No one wants to end their day - or their life - as an apex predator's lunch.

item.title: Wandering: New York
item.description:
Wandering: New York

Please watch this video with headphones or good speakers for the full effect! This short film aims to give a brief portrait of what it feels like to wander around New York City. These 3 minutes will hopefully give you the impression of being right in the city.

item.title: High Velocity Aerial Filming
item.description:
High Velocity Aerial Filming

Aerial Filming took a giant leap forward when Blue Sky and Peter Degerfeldt challenged Gyro-stabilized Systems in Grass Valley, US, to build a GSS 520 5 axis system that would produce rock solid images at a speed of more than 300 knots per hour.

item.title: Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set
item.description:
Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set

At a conference on productivity-which touched on everything from the importance of tech-free alone time to the educational and emotional benefits of writing by hand (as outlined in a series of studies on the subject)- Moleskine unveiled their latest analog-to-digital wonder.

item.title: Unsplash | Free High Resolution Photos
item.description:
Unsplash | Free High Resolution Photos

Do whatever you want free high-resolution photos. Download 10 new free photos every 10 days.

item.title: 100 Stunning Picture Quotes That Will Supercharge Your Creativity
item.description:
100 Stunning Picture Quotes That Will Supercharge Your Creativity

Find your next favorite quote rendered in stunning graphic design.

item.title: Twin peaks: Vollebak's high-tech sportswear aids recovery.
item.description:
Twin peaks: Vollebak's high-tech sportswear aids recovery.

Hi-tech sportswear generally makes a number of simple promises, usually concentrating on the during of what you do rather than the before or after. New London-based adventure clothing brand Vollebak takes a more experimental, tangential approach to performance enhancement.

item.title: Photos of Various Food Dishes Flying Through the Air
item.description:
Photos of Various Food Dishes Flying Through the Air

Camden, London-based commercial still life photographer Piotr Gregorczyk likes to play with food and gravity. One concept he has focused on for a number of recent projects is the idea of showing various food dishes flying through the air as they come together on a plate or in a bowl.
